Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to the definition of "protected consumer"
Summary: Defines a "protected consumer" as an individual who is under the age of eighteen years.
LawCode: Amd ยง380-a, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the definition of "protected consumer"
